item.title: Letsencrypt errors with new apache2 virtualhosts
item.description: I wanted to use letsencrypt on new virtualhosts with apache2 that didn’t have any certificates. I encountered all these errors … - The server could not connect to the client to verify the domain :: Failed to connect to x.x.x.x:443 for TLS-SNI-01 challenge - Server only speaks HTTP, not TLS - MisconfigurationError: Error while running apache2ctl graceful. - AH00112: Warning: DocumentRoot [/var/lib/letsencrypt/tls_sni_01_page/] does not exist but these errors can be avoided 99% of the time by checking the following
